name: ShopaService.com
overview:
ShopaService Inc is a lifestyle and consumer services web portal based out of New York City, USA. We are building America’s largest marketplace for browsing and booking for services that include Auto Services, Restaurants, Spas, Home Improvement, and Entertainment etc.

ShopaService.com is a 2 in 1 “Global Marketing & Reservation Network” for consumer services and recreation industry that offers both real-time online booking engine based on next-generation platform and new sales & marketing channel to increase revenue streams for our suppliers. Through our internet portal, customers can browse for best rated activities, read customer reviews, invite friends for group bookings, check out special offers/last-minute deals, book online and receive instant confirmation. No need to call anyone and absolutely no need to browse through a myriad of websites. Read more about us via http://www.shopaservice.com.
